Tagline: Fear Takes Flight

Plot Outline: A woman is kidnapped by a stranger on a routine flight. Threatened by the potential murder of her father, she is pulled into a plot to assist her captor in offing a politician. (more) (view trailer)

User Comments: Wes Craven finally gets the red out of his eyes and brings us something not irritating to see (more)
